text: I was following this thread of someone wanting to combine two marketplace themes. Franken-theme. It got me thinking... as a theme provider would you still provide support for a theme if it contains outside modules? Does this type of thing unbind a theme provider from providing support if a customer requested it? <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Is-it-possible-to-combine-or-merge-2-themes/m-p/790634#M34063>

Isn't that why HubSpot is working on changing the theme requirements so modules can be cross compatible though? I don't know how it would work with a custom theme though, unless it was coded with the same requirements
